title: Broken streetlight near Central Park
description: Streetlight not working for 3 nights, area is dark and unsafe.

title: Flickering lamp post on Riverside Rd
location: Riverside Rd near Bus Stop B2, Dhaka
description: Lamp flickers intermittently causing visibility issues for pedestrians.

title: Large pothole by School Entrance
location: Maple St & 3rd Ave, Near Greenfield School, Dhaka
description: Deep pothole causing traffic slowdowns and vehicle damage.

title: Series of small potholes on Market Lane
description: Multiple shallow potholes forming across the lane after rains.

title: Water leakage from main pipe at Block C
location: Block C, Housing Complex A, Dhaka
description: Continuous leakage flooding pedestrian walkway and undermining pavement.

title: Seepage near underground drain on Hill Road
description: Slow seepage after recent rains causing slippery surface.

title: Garbage overflow at Sector 7 container
description: Container overflowing for 2 days, foul smell and stray animals present.

title: Garbage piles beside Alley 12
description: Loose garbage bags left uncollected creating blockage.

title: Damaged footpath with broken slabs
description: Several broken slabs creating trip hazards for students and elderly.

title: Uneven footpath near Bus Stop 5
description: Raised sections and cracks causing difficulty for wheelchair users.
